enb_long_title: Seventh Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate
enb_short_title: 7th Session of the AGBM, 6th Session SBSTA & SBI, AG13 5
section_title: A BRIEF ANALYSIS OF THE AGBM
sentences: Now that AGBM-7 is history, many may ask if governments are any closer to reaching agreement on strengthening the Framework Convention on Climate Change.
Alas, an assessment of just how much was achieved is as open to interpretation as was the much disputed status of Schuberts 'unfinished symphony.

' To make such an assessment, three key questions were put to delegates and observers as they moved between the Beethoven, Schubert and Haydn Rooms at the Maritim Hotel during AGBM-7: where did the movement or progress occur in this round of negotiations; what are the emerging linkages or tradeoffs; and what are the key opportunities in the all-important forthcoming intersessional period to advance the process to achieve an outcome acceptable in the eyes of the Parties.
